column1: Smoque BBQ////I enjoyed my visit to Smoque
column2: everything I ate was tasty.  That being said
column3: unless I happen to be in the neighborhood
column4: in the mood for some bbq I doubt I'll be returning soon.  Personally
column5: I think that there are a few spots in the city that are just as good if not better... still
column6: If you haven't been I encourage you to try it.
